text: "Caravan Girl" is a folktronica song performed by British duo Goldfrapp. The song was written and produced by Alison Goldfrapp and Will Gregory for the duo's fourth album Seventh Tree (2008). It was released as the album's third single on 30 June 2008 and peaked at number 54 on the UK Singles Chart. In Scotland, the song reached number 6, becoming the third single from Seventh Tree to reach the top ten. ==Music video== The music video premiered on Channel 4 on Saturday 14 June 2008, and Mute Records made the video available on YouTube the following day. The video, which is Goldfrapp's first not to include Alison Goldfrapp, features a girl riding her longboard. It was filmed, among other places, in Cambria, California. The video was directed by The Malloys. ==Track listings== *;UK CD single #1 #"Caravan Girl" — 4:04 #"Happiness" (Video) — 3:41 *;UK CD single #2 #"Caravan Girl" (Live Choral Version) — 4:44 #"Monster Love" (Live Acoustic Version) — 4:41 #"Little Bird" (Live at the Union Chapel) (Video) — 6:35 *;UK 7" single #"Caravan Girl" (Edit) — 3:40 #"Little Bird" (Animal Collective Remix) — 3:19 *;Digital download (EP) #"Caravan Girl" — 4:05 #"Caravan Girl" (Live Choral Version) — 4:42 #"Little Bird" (Animal Collective Remix) — 3:19 #"Monster Love" (Live Acoustic Version) — 4:38 #"Winter Wonderland" — 3:10 ==Personnel== The following people contributed to "Caravan Girl":Seventh Tree (CD liner notes). Mute Records.
